column1: On February 7 the President told Bob Woodward that COVID-19 was “more deadly than even your strenuous flu” even as he publicly downplayed the virus.  Eight months and more than 210000 deaths later the President is still lying to the American people.
Shocking but not surprising: The President is the single largest driver of coronavirus misinformation.   #FailureToLead https://t.co/EHaHcJLyf8

The Black community has been hit hard by the coronavirus.  Today I am joining @KamalaHarris and Black community leaders for a town hall moderated by @SymoneDSanders on #COVID19 disparities & @JoeBiden’s plan to address them.  Tune in at 3:30 PM: https://t.co/xfCdQ9vBSI

HAPPENING TODAY: At 4pm join federal state and city officials from across Ohio for a discussion on how coronavirus is impacting Black communities.  RSVP using the link below or call 855-756-7520 (Code ID: 59292) to join. https://t.co/IQ8Kc4PdGK

I am hosting a tele town hall with @JoyceBeatty @EmiliaSykesOH and other African American elected officials from across Ohio on Monday to discuss the impact of #COVID19 on Black communities.  Use the below link to RSVP! https://t.co/Q6Is8Xbiiv
